oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On compactness of Hankel and the $\bar{\partial}$-Neumann operators on Hartogs domains in $\mathbb{C}^2$
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sahutoglu, Sonmez
Zeytuncu, Yunus E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Complex Variables
32W05
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove that on smooth bounded pseudoconvex Hartogs domains in $\mathbb{C}^2$ compactness of the $\bar{\partial}$-Neumann operator is equivalent to compactness of all Hankel operators with symbols smooth on the closure of the domain.
Comment: 10 pages, to appear in the Journal of Geometric Analysis
